alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Perkins, eastern Keith, northeastern Chase, northwestern Lincoln, southwestern Logan, southeastern McPherson and northwestern Hayes Counties through 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/... At 541 PM CDT/441 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Tryon to 6 miles north of Venango. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Ogallala, Imperial, Grant, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Wallace, Madrid, Venango, Elsie, Sarben, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Roscoe, Grainton, Brandon, Coker, O`Fallons, Nevens and Broganville. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 41 and 86. Highway 92 between mile markers 218 and 219, and between mile markers 233 and 236. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 25. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 125 and 175. Highway 83 between mile markers 84 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins
